name: not all the light goes out / no se va toda la luz
description:
At that time my mother and I lived together when the electricity rationing in Venezuela intensified. The service was suspended for up to 4 hours and we thought that it could not be worse, time showed us that it could be worse.

I don't mean to romanticize the situation, but being with her made everything tolerable, we got closer, got to know each other better and played scrabble by candlelight.
